title: Application of a cloud platform that identifies patient-ventilator asynchrony and enables continuous monitoring of mechanical ventilation in intensive care unit
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Xiangyu Chen, Junping Fan, Wenxian Zhao, Ruochun Shi, Nan Guo, Zhigang Chang, Maifen Song, Xuedong Wang, Yan Chen, Tong Li, Guang-gang Li, Longxiang Su, Yun Long, on bahalf of Beijing Dongcheng Critical Care Quality Control Centre Group
